feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.3.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Retries to fetch more logs if no logs are fetched when scrolling up  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3230 (afcb8)
  • Adds animations to bottom when in live mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3231 (aec81)
  • Changes scroll progress to reflect total available logs instead of just the logs in the browser  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3236 (0a039)
  • Adds a side panel for complex logs that enables reordering and enabling fields  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3237 (85271)
  • Show version number on top right. see #3228  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3239 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3228 (9ea70)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes settings page when changing language  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3216 (43194)
  • Host port nb typo in readme  -  by @Qhilm in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3220 (eaf20)
  • Fixes infinite loop when there are no logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3235 (3a0ea)
  • Fixes broken skip logs  -  by @amir20 (0798d)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3209 (9f743)
  • Update dependency @vueuse/core to v11  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3211 (acd99)
  • Update dependency @vueuse/components to v11  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3210 (3d9e0)
  • Update dependency @vueuse/router to v11  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3213 (1dea4)
  • Update dependency unplugin-vue-macros to ^2.11.6  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3215 (b5461)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3232 (4bb00)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3238 (62a2e)

   üèé Performance

  • Tries to improve burst of logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3227 (36f33)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.0
entry.content:
üö® Breaking Changes

  • Moves search to backend for better experience. It does remove show search results in context.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3245 (9f2f8)

   üöÄ Features

  • Makes improvements to mobile view  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3244 (74063)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Supports searching for int, float and boolean  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3247 (a1efb)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes merged view and incorrect base. fixes #3248  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3249 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3248 (2a3af)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Shows raw json in complex logs with option to copy  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3251 (9ddbe)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improves search on initital load  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3253 (45c72)
  • Fixes search while looking back history  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3256 (6791c)
  • Improves search by backfilling on first search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3261 (a5ffd)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3241 (0d58f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3260 (328a2)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.3
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Cleans up on hover background color  -  by @amir20 (d6477)
  • Cleans up login page  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3263 (8183b)
  • deps: Update dependency unplugin-vue-router to ^0.10.8  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3262 (14187)

   üèé Performance

  • Improves animation css to use translate instead  -  by @amir20 (e841b)
    View changes on GitHub
